snippet: While supporters cheer the Obama administration's new immigration policy, opponents say the president is improperly bypassing Congress and playing election year politics.
abstract: While supporters cheer the Obama administration's new immigration policy, opponents say the president is improperly bypassing Congress and playing election year politics.

headline.main: Obama's Decision on Immigration Is Met With Joy, Anger and Skepticism
